name: BROCCOLI MAN
description: You are what you eat, right? Then I'm broccoli

name: CAT'S MEMORIES
description: I'm always thinking about you, that's the PURRRblem.

name: RESET!
description: Sometimes, what we go looking for outside really is within reach.

name: FEAR GHOST
description: When the fear paralyzes us, then we are dead.

name: GODDES OF WISDOM
description: She's the one of the wisdom, the one that doesn't sleep at night.

name: The doubt
description: The doubt is inherent, we can't scape from her, neither she from us.

name: Think, grow, create...
description: When ideas and concentration blossom, Let's get to work!

name: In the clouds
description: Who hasn't been lost, with the head up in the clouds?.
